item.title: Video presenter - US market - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a host/video presenter who would be making some tutorials for the Selmo system.

Requirements:
- native american english
- good voice and speaking clearly
- experiencing acting in front of the camera
- age between 25 and 38 years

Our goal is to hire someone who can edit videos according to our guidelines too. We plan to release about 10 videos monthly, so it's a long-term project.

Kindly send me your portfolio/video samples via DM, as well as the price of one ready video :).

Budget: $150

item.title: Youtube Thumbnail Creator - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description: YouTube Thumbnail Graphic Designer

Position: YouTube Thumbnail Graphic Designer
Location: Remote
Type: Freelance/Contract

About Us:
We are a dynamic and growing digital content creation company focusing on educational and insightful videos in business, marketing, and personal development. Our mission is to engage and educate our audience through high-quality content and visually appealing designs.

Job Overview:
We seek a talented and creative YouTube Thumbnail Graphic Designer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong eye for design, a deep understanding of YouTube’s best practices, and the ability to create compelling thumbnails that attract viewers. You will be responsible for designing thumbnails for our existing video library, ensuring each is unique, professional, and reflective of our brand.

Key Responsibilities:

• Design eye-catching and professional thumbnails for existing YouTube videos.
• Ensure all thumbnails adhere to YouTube’s best practices and guidelines.
• Collaborate with the content team to understand the themes and messages of each video.
• Create visually appealing designs that drive viewer engagement and click-through rates.
• Maintain consistency with our brand’s visual style and tone.
• Incorporate feedback from the team to refine and improve thumbnail designs.
• Stay up-to-date with the latest design trends and YouTube thumbnail strategies.

Requirements:

• Proven experience as a graphic designer, specifically in creating YouTube thumbnails.
• Strong portfolio showcasing your design skills and creativity.
• Proficiency in graphic design software such as Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, or Canva.
• Understanding of YouTube’s best practices and trends for thumbnails.
• Excellent visual design skills with attention to detail.
• Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
• Strong communication skills and ability to work collaboratively with a remote team.
• Knowledge of marketing and branding principles is a plus.

Preferred Qualifications:

• Experience in digital content creation or marketing.
• Familiarity with video editing software.
• Basic knowledge of SEO and how it relates to YouTube.

How to Apply:
If you are passionate about graphic design and have a knack for creating engaging YouTube thumbnails, we’d love to hear from you! Please submit your resume, cover letter, and portfolio of work that demonstrates your skills and creativity.


Hourly Range: $3.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 15:10 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Graphic Design, YouTube, YouTube Marketing, Social Media Imagery
Skills: Graphic Design, YouTube, YouTube Marketing, Social Media Imagery
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Company Introduction Video Creation - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented video creator to produce a captivating company introduction video. The video should effectively showcase our brand's value proposition in a visually engaging way. The ideal candidate will have experience in video production, storytelling, and motion graphics. They should be able to understand our brand identity and translate it into a compelling narrative. The video should be no longer than 60 sections in length and include high-quality visuals, background music, and voiceover. Additionally, the candidate should be proficient in video editing software and have a strong portfolio showcasing their previous work in creating similar videos.

A script and brief have been written. Screenshots of the product will be provided. If we are interested, we will ask you to view the brief and give an approximate timeline.

Hourly Range: $20.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 15:00 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Commercial, Explainer Video, Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Commercial, Explainer Video, Video Editing, Video Production
Country: Israel

item.title: Virtual Assistant for Video Review - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:
We are seeking a detail-oriented and tech-savvy Virtual Assistant to join our team. The ideal candidate should have a deep understanding of what captures the attention of social media users and how to leverage the content from our course videos to create engaging short posts that drive interaction. Our courses cover professional development topics for CPAs, Attorneys, Engineers, HR, and more. The core responsibility of this role is to review our course videos to ensure they meet our quality standards, outline specific time stamps, and work alongside our Social Media Coordinator. This remote position requires a sharp eye for detail and a strong passion for digital content.


Responsibilities:
- Review a wide range of professional development videos to assess sound and video quality, ensuring high standards are met.
- Evaluate the content of each course to determine its relevance and interest level for specific professional audiences - CPAs, Lawyers, Engineers, HR, and more.
- Identify and timestamp key moments in each video that are particularly engaging or informative for potential use in social media clips.
- Maintain detailed records of reviewed videos and selected clips, providing clear notes and justifications for choices.
- Collaborate with and provide reports to the Social Media Coordinator, offering suggestions for video clips that are in tune with current trends and resonate with our audience's preferences.


Requirements:
- Ability to work 5-7 hours per week
- Outstanding attention to detail and a sharp eye for engaging content suitable for professional audiences
- Basic understanding of various professional fields such as accounting, law, engineering, and human resources is preferred.
- Ability to work independently and efficiently in a remote setting.
- Proficient in using video playback tools to accurately identify and timestamp specific parts of a video.
- Good communication skills and the ability to provide clear, concise feedback and recommendations.
- PC or laptop and reliable internet connection.
- Ability to maintain confidentiality and ethical standards.


Posted On: June 20, 2024 15:02 UTC
Category: General Virtual Assistance
Skills:Virtual Assistance, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Data Entry
Skills: Virtual Assistance, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Data Entry
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Experienced Videographer for Media Content in Istanbul - Upwork
item.description:
Job Title: Videographer/Content Creator

Location: Istanbul, Turkey

Company: TIM Company GmbH

We are seeking a skilled and creative Videographer/Content Creator to join our team in Istanbul. As a Videographer/Content Creator, you will be responsible for producing engaging visual content for our exciting new project. The ideal candidate will possess a strong background in videography, a keen eye for capturing captivating visuals, and a deep understanding of current video trends.

Responsibilities:
- Shoot and edit high-quality videos, ensuring they reflect our brand aesthetic
- Collaborate with the team to brainstorm and conceptualize innovative video ideas
- Stay up-to-date with the latest video trends and techniques
- Communicate effectively with team members to ensure project objectives are met
- Maintain organized files and assets to facilitate smooth video production processes

Requirements:
- Proven experience as a Videographer/Content Creator
- Proficient in video editing software
- Strong creative visualization skills
- Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities
- Attention to detail and ability to deliver high-quality work on time
- Passion for videography and a commitment to staying updated with industry advancements

If you are a passionate Videographer/Content Creator with a drive for producing visually compelling content, we would love to hear from you. Join our team and be part of an exciting new project in Istanbul.

Budget: $2,000
Posted On: June 20, 2024 15:05 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Video Editing, Videography, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Videography, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Country: Germany

item.title: VIDEO EDITOR GENIUS wanted - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled and creative Video Editor to join our team. PLEASE read the entire description. You will be responsible for producing visually engaging and compelling video content for our social media channels.  As a video editor, you will convert sections of longer videos into engaging social media content for Tiktok, Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn. You will work closely with our team to deliver content that will meet expectations and meet industry standards.

Video editor responsibilities:
* Edit raw video footage into polished, visually compelling video productions.
* Cut, splice, and synchronize video and audio clips, apply transitions, titles, sound effects, and color corrections.
* Select and add appropriate music and sound effects to videos.
* Create and implement graphics and special effects in video.
* Collaborate with the team to develop video marketing strategies
* Maintain high quality and accuracy in all aspects of the video production process.
* Continuously update/edit video content in response to feedback from clients, colleagues, or as needed.
* Meet tight deadlines and work efficiently under pressure.

Requirements:

*PROVEN  work product as a video editor or videographer
* Strong knowledge and experience with video editing software of your choosing (Adobe Premiere, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve, and Avid Media Composer)
* Proficient in the use of editing, graphic, and special effects video software
* A keen eye, attention to detail, and artistic ability
* Ability to manage multiple projects from concept to final delivery by meeting deadlines collaboratively and independently
* Understanding of color grading, audio mixing, and video output formats
* Proven experience in video recording, scripting, directing, and lighting would be a plus
* Ability to work with a diverse and global team

If this sounds like you and you want to join a crazy fast growing company than apply now. FYI, we will need proof of ability beforehand. Talk is cheap, work product speaks volumes.

The following are some examples of work to copy or use as a basis. BUT BUT BUT,...we really want to have our own unique style that we can own. If you can do THAT, you're in.

https://youtube.com/shorts/aaOzocwMefc?si=xvpK63QsgJHf5euV
https://youtube.com/shorts/MNT1VikgiM4?si=BlK4Aoe0E5kjG8Pm
https://youtube.com/shorts/IU2iNrgHYOI?si=lTsuqJnJwABxpJ3T
https://youtube.com/shorts/PbdRNHjl8WU?si=MeBm43Ppie_-_0H1

Here's a sample of work we need edited:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1V3oaQatQlFKvvA6J-_D6Iw1IEmrUV1i3/view?usp=sharing

Please download this video file and create an engaging vertical video sized for tiktok. The timestamp for the section to use is as follows: 3:58-4:18.

First and last words of section, "As you put your team together... leapfrog generational development.

Again, if you make it unique, a unique angle or style, and something we can use to grow upon...you're in. We have approximately 50+ videos per month. Maybe much more depending.

Reach out if you have any questions. DO NOT JUST reply with your portfolio. No offense, but portfolios can be copied.  

Reach out if you have any questions!


Posted On: June 20, 2024 14:52 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Video, YouTube Shorts, Instagram Reels, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Custom Sound Effects, Video Editing & Production, TikTok
Skills: Social Media Video, YouTube Shorts, Instagram Reels, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Custom Sound Effects, Video Editing & Production, TikTok
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Content Creator for Short-Form Videos Using Canva and CapCut - Upwork
item.description:
Project Description:

Pierre Henry Socks, a leading Ecommerce brand specializing in over-the-calf dress socks for men, is seeking a talented content creator to transform our written articles into engaging short-form videos. These videos will be shared across our social media platforms, including Instagram, TikTok, YouTube Shorts, and Twitter, to increase brand visibility and drive customer engagement.

(NOTE: This fixed contract is our budget for the first 30 videos (30 sec - 1 minute), if successful, we can work together more.)

Project Scope:

1. Content Transformation:
• Convert our existing written articles into visually appealing and engaging short-form videos.
• Ensure that each video effectively communicates the key messages and value propositions of the articles.
2. Video Creation:
• Use Canva and CapCut to design and edit videos, incorporating text overlays, animations, and other visual elements.
• Create videos that are optimized for each social media platform (Instagram, TikTok, YouTube Shorts, Twitter) in terms of format, length, and style.
• Incorporate brand elements and maintain a consistent look and feel across all videos.
3. Platform Optimization:
• Tailor each video to fit the specific requirements and audience preferences of each platform.
• Use platform-specific features (e.g., TikTok trends, Instagram Reels effects) to enhance video reach and engagement.

Key Responsibilities:

• Collaborate with our marketing team to understand the key points and objectives of each article.
• Develop a creative approach for each video that aligns with our brand voice and style.
• Ensure all videos are high-quality, engaging, and suitable for social media distribution.
• Stay up-to-date with social media trends and incorporate relevant elements to maximize video impact.

Qualifications:

• Proven experience in creating short-form videos for social media platforms.
• Proficiency in using Canva and CapCut for video design and editing.
• Strong understanding of social media best practices and trends.
• Creative mindset with the ability to transform written content into compelling visual stories.
• Excellent communication skills and ability to work collaboratively with a team.

Budget: $350
Posted On: June 20, 2024 14:52 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:CapCut, Graphic Design, Video Editing, Canva, Writing
Skills: CapCut, Graphic Design, Video Editing, Canva, Writing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Looking for Engaging Spokesperson/ UGC to Present YouTube Videos! - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

I am seeking someone who can read off scripts and present themselves in person.

This person will be in charge of being the spokesperson for various topics related to softwares, applications, services, and programs.

The person would need to have the following:
- Good on camera prescence
- English accent
- Good camera
- Teleprompter
- Good lighting

This person will be filming themselves reading off a script.

Compensation will be $12 per script read. Scripts will range from 8-20 minutes long.

These videos will be posted onto YouTube and we will be using stillshots of you to create thumbnails as well.

item.title: 3 Comedic Audio Shorts for health & fitness start-up - Upwork
item.description:
Currently in Beta Launch, Better Body Work is a web platform that helps people find bodyworkers and personal trainers that are a good fit for them based on location, goals/needs and personality fit.
~
I’m looking for a comedic performer to write up and perform 3 separate 30-45 comedic jingles that we’ll add to the triptych illustration pinned to the too of our socials.

We need to add audio to these images so they become videos we can post to Tik Tok and YouTube anyways, so I figured  why not do something a little more fun than cheesy elevator music.

Think Adam Sandler or Monty Python, a satirical take on the proliferation of motivational videos and #blessed cultures, poking fun at ourselves and the wellness/fitness world we reside within.

I’m hoping to find someone that crushes this well enough that exploring the idea of doing several multimedia posts with a similar theme is a conversation worth exploring for us both.

You can see the way the triptych appears at the top of our Instagram.

IG: https://www.instagram.com/better.bodywork

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 20, 2024 14:47 UTC
Category: Voice Talent
Skills:Comedy, Comedy Writing, Audio Ad, Voice-Over, Voice Recording, Creative Writing
Skills: Comedy, Comedy Writing, Audio Ad, Voice-Over, Voice Recording, Creative Writing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video presentation Artist - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a video recording (Loom or any other) (On-Camera Spokesperson, UGC) artist who can record how to setup videos for our saas Tech platform for different Usecases.

Example - https://youtu.be/gSnb-xWRjTk?si=1PGhvJrBFC6J7W7N

DISCLAIMER: We are NOT LOOKING FOR ANIMATED SAAS EXPLAINER VIDEOS.

The freelancer should be able to:
1. Record the video using Loom or other software  (along with a small snippet of their face visible in the video) - American English and Accent required
3. Record voiceover along with the video based on the script
4. Edit the video so by using zoom in effects or focus effects to highlight which section is being talked about in the video
5. The freelancer needs to have a good microphone to record the voiceover in high quality. Laptop mics won't work (this is important)

If the project goes well, we'll commission more videos and turn this into a recurring engagement.



Budget: $20
Posted On: June 20, 2024 14:36 UTC
Category: Acting
Skills:Spokesperson Video
Skills: Spokesperson Video
Country: Canada

item.title: Low Budget Humor/Explainer Video Production - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented video producer to help us shoot a low budget humor/explainer video. The video will have 2 settings and 2 actors. This video will be used for marketing purposes and to engage with our target audience. We need someone who can bring creativity and humor to the project while working within a limited budget. As the video producer, your responsibilities will include scriptwriting, location scouting, casting actors, directing, and post-production editing. The ideal candidate should have experience in producing humor videos and be able to work collaboratively with our team.

Skills required:
- Video production
- Scriptwriting
- Casting
- Directing
- Post-production editing

We are a startup with a limited budget, so this is a small project. The estimated duration for the project is under 1 month. We are looking for an expert in humor video production to bring our vision to life. If you have a knack for creating funny and engaging videos, we'd love to hear from you!

Hourly Range: $25.00-$55.00

Category: Video Production
Skills:Explainer Video, Video Production, Video Commercial, 2D Animation, Video Editing
Skills: Explainer Video, Video Production, Video Commercial, 2D Animation, Video Editing

item.title: Testimonials video shoot - Voorhout, Netherlands (near Amsterdam) - Upwork
item.description:
Hi,
We're looking for a videographer for a testimonial shoot in - Voorhout, Netherlands (near Amsterdam)

July 10th, 2024 - 8AM local time
PLEASE READ THE PDF ATTACHED.

1 hour prep
2.5 hours video testimonial shoot + b-rolls on site

We will provide all the information you may need - name, phone number and address.

Please take a close look at the filming guideline attached.

The interviews will have to be live on ZOOM so we can hear and see everything live and able to direct also.

Equipment wise - Camera Sony A7S or better, sound recording equipment, a little bit of lights.

After shooting deliver all the material at the same day via Internet.

We think 1 person is enough for this job, we will talk and coordinate everything, you will do the interview and receive from us the questions you need to ask and what are the key answers that we need for the video.

For the testimonials - 1 Angel of shooting is enough, but shoot it in 4K so we can cut it on editing.

Thank you.

Budget: $700

Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Photography, Video Production, Cinematography, Testimonial Video

Hi,
We're looking for a videographer for a testimonial shoot in - Voorhout, Netherlands (near Amsterdam)

July 10th, 2024 - 8AM local time
PLEASE READ THE PDF ATTACHED.

1 hour prep
2.5 hours video testimonial shoot + b-rolls on site

We will provide all the information you may need - name, phone number and address.

Please take a close look at the filming guideline attached.

The interviews will have to be live on ZOOM so we can hear and see everything live and able to direct also.

Equipment wise - Camera Sony A7S or better, sound recording equipment, a little bit of lights.

After shooting deliver all the material at the same day via Internet.

We think 1 person is enough for this job, we will talk and coordinate everything, you will do the interview and receive from us the questions you need to ask and what are the key answers that we need for the video.

For the testimonials - 1 Angel of shooting is enough, but shoot it in 4K so we can cut it on editing.

Thank you.

item.title: 🚨Thumbnail Editor - Youtube - Long Term🚨 - Upwork
item.description:
READ!

We are searching for a long term Thumbnial editor.
We offer a lot of growth potential within the company so we are looking for someone who is willing to climb up the ladder!

Payment:
You'll get 10$ per thumbnail wich means you earn based on performance.

Adaptability:
We are the owners of multiple Youtube channels, all channels work with different styles, and we also start new channels ones in a while wich requires someone who is willing to learn and invest his/hers own time into learning the craft of a specefic niche.

Availability:
We are looking for someone who is broadly available and does not have another fulltime job on the side.

Are you an A-Player?
We are only looking for A-Players; People with  ambition and motivation to excel. They set high standards for themselves and continually strive for excellence in everything they do.

If you want to grow and excell within our company send us a BLANK proposal with only a link to a LOOM Video introducing yourself and speaking about your knowledge on Youtube thumbnials + explaining why you want to work with us.

WANT TO GET HIRED QUICKLY?
Deliver 3 test thumbnials in your cover letter, based on the following 3 channels:
We will not use these thumbnails for anything, you can even put a watermark over it. we just need to see if your able to take over a style.

https://youtube.com/@centraldiscovery34486?si=r7aaEhQyROKQh1dY

https://youtube.com/@beyonddiscoveryofficial?si=XW_k0XeNjOB7M9uV (James’s Webb topic)

https://youtube.com/@matterspace?si=VWF5i9_foQxbgOGa


You NEED to be proficient with and have Midjourney!

I hope to meet you soon, so we can get to the top together.



Budget: $300
Posted On: June 20, 2024 14:13 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Adobe Photoshop, Photo Editing, Graphic Design
Skills: Adobe Photoshop, Photo Editing, Graphic Design
Country: Netherlands
click to apply
